You can use Medicare's ""Home Health Compare"" tool to compare home health agencies in your area. Visit http://www.medicare.gov. Under ""Search Tools,"" select ""Compare Home Health Agencies in Your Area.""",NIHSeniorHealth,Medicare and Continuing Care
